plot: Peter moves back to the Richters. Vera is not enthusiastic about it, but she does not want to mess with her son Heiko. The friends go in search of Peter's true parents. The only clue is the address of a woman landlord, who allegedly arranged the baby swap at the time. But the address is no longer correct. The current resident does not know where the former tenants have moved. Frank has an appointment with Patricia to play golf. Tina is angry because he moves her because of it.
